FILE
  PsiElement(comment)('/*\n'and' has a lower precedence than '+' so appears\nas a root node for the the plus expressions\n*/')
  PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
  ExampleRecursiveExpressionExampleImpl(RECURSIVE_EXPRESSION_EXAMPLE)
    PsiElement(recursive_expression)('recursive_expression')
    PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
    PsiElement({)('{')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n    ')
    ExampleOrExpressionImpl(OR_EXPRESSION)
      ExampleAddExpressionImpl(ADD_EXPRESSION)
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('a')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        PsiElement(+)('+')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('b')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      PsiElement(and)('and')
      PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
      ExampleAddExpressionImpl(ADD_EXPRESSION)
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('c')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        PsiElement(+)('+')
        PsiWhiteSpace(' ')
        ExampleIdentifierExpressionImpl(IDENTIFIER_EXPRESSION)
          PsiElement(LIDENT)('d')
    PsiWhiteSpace('\n')
    PsiElement(})('}')
